person.persName: John Thornton Sinclair (Scott County, Kentucky, farmer, slaveholder, and prisoner of war)

body.p: Scott County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky, native. Married to Mary Elizabeth Massie Sinclair in Scott County, Kentucky on December 18, 1865. Resident of Scott County, Kentucky, in 1850. Farmer in Scott County in 1860. Served in the 5th Kentucky Volunteer Cavalry Regiment (C.S.A.) as a second lieutenant from September 2, 1862. Captured at Buffington, Indiana, on July 19, 1863 to June 1865. Reported as a prisoner of war at Pittsburgh, Pennsylvania and Fort Delaware, Delaware.
